# autoglue_cluster_glueops_load_balancer (Resource)

Attaches a GlueOps/control-plane load balancer to a cluster.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) Cluster ID.
- `load_balancer_id` (String) Load balancer ID to attach as GlueOps/control-plane LB.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Synthetic ID, equal to cluster_id.
